name: Imminent (Manojo)
description:
You've been lead into a dark forest. Stay close and don't get lost while keeping distance from the ghouls! Use your flashlight to focus a beam of light to disintegrate your enemies as you journey deeper into the woods.

Developed in 48 hours for Game Jam Aotearoa 2020. The given theme was "proximity" so after a quick brainstorm, we've decided on this game idea. The concept is simple: maintain correct distance and take advantage of the proximity sensor to sense how close the ghouls are getting to you.

Controls:
W, A, S, D to move
Mouse to look around
Hold left or right mouse button to focus your flashlight

Credits:
Norbert Staskevicius
Mason Baxter
John Kim

Big thank you to all the organizers and sponsors who helped this event take place!
